fields.name: Notes
fields.value: The Drowner is an enemy attacking the player with magic attack. Can drop a chest with evolution.

fields.name: Spawning
fields.value:
In Gallo Tower, The Drowner may be spawned by staying below the 25 minute boss.
In The Bone Zone, The Drowiner spawns on the 20 minute mark
In both Gallo Tower and The Bone Zone, The Drowner spawns on the 30 minute mark.

fields.name: Killing
fields.value:
If the Drowner spawned before the 30 minute mark, it can be killed by either **Roasry** or **Gorgeous Moon**
If the Drowner spawned at the 30 minute mark, it **cannot** be killed.
